text.title: part15_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes
text.p:
Jada :
Some of us will have this one bar where it ’s like , ‘ Hey ! We ’re all here ! ’

Veronica :
I ’m not into the Goth scene , but a lot of women who do this are in the vampire thing .

Jada :
I ’m not into the Goth scene , but I do like vampires … .

hi.s: DS : When you date , do you tell guys what you do ?

text.p:
Veronica :
Ummm , yes .
Yes , I do .

hi.s: Is that a first date conversation ?

text.p:
Veronica :
The first date .
I like to be very up front with people , because this is what I do , this is what I see myself doing for a long time , so if they are not cool with it , then fuck that .

hi.s: DS : What kind of reaction do you typically get ?

text.p:
Veronica :
I typically get , “ Wow , I ’m really turned on by that . ”

Jada :
I ’ve gotten that from a friend .

p.s: And then they ’re concerned about , “ Well , how much do you do … ? ” and then it gets into the whole ownership of my body .
IF somebody asks me that , I typically do n’t see them anymore .

hi.s: DS : Because it then becomes about what ?

text.p:
Jada :
Then you have no control over anything .
It becomes not safe .

Veronica :
Yeah , men a lot of the time , when you are in an industry like this , do n’t want you go expose certain parts of yourself because they feel that you are ‘ ’ theirs ’ ’ , so when somebody is like that , it really turns me off .

Veronica :
Alright , so , if I told certain men that I date that I go topless in session , that would make them feel very uncomfortable because that ’s then supposed to be only for ‘ ’ their ’ ’ eyes , right ?
Which is ridiculous .
I have n’t been dating men so much lately .

p.s: Is that what turned you off ?

text.p:
Veronica :
No no , that ’s not it at all .
Women are a lot more amenable to that sort of thing .
More sophisticated .

hi.s: DS : What do women you date say about it ?

text.p:
Veronica :
A lot of women I ’ve dated have experience with this industry , so it ’s not really an issue at all .
SO , I do n’t have to formulate an answer to any question because they are already involved .

Veronica :
Yes !
Yeah , it really is .
To not be judged for it , and not tip toe around what I do .

hi.s: DS : How long do you think you ’ll do this for ?
DS : Then what do you think you ’ll do ?

text.p:
Veronica :
I ’m getting my graduate degree in art history , and I work at a magazine , so I ’m expecting that to gel into something .
